title.rendered: How to install a hidden Windows 7 Operating System with VeraCrypt

content.rendered:
We have just posted our Windows 7 hidden operating system guide on YouTube here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BFfl-YGsOGA

In this guide, we show you how to create a VeraCrypt Windows 7 hidden operating system. This enables you to hide your operating system within an encrypted partition, creating data assurance for your OS and maximum privacy.

VeraCrypt is powerful, free, open-source software that enables people around the world to protect their data with unbreakable encryption.

If you like this guide and would like to see more, please support us on Patreon at https://patreon.com/OSTIF Contributions to Patreon are earmaked for creating new and better guide videos for Open Source security software!

You can download and use VeraCrypt for free here: https://www.veracrypt.fr/en/Home.html

VeraCrypt has been audited by OSTIF and QuarksLab! You can see the audit results here! https://ostif.org/the-veracrypt-audit-results/

OSTIF is a lot more than just guide videos. We help developers improve their open source software and publicly verify the strength and integrity of software all through support from the privacy community. Visit our site to find out more, or support the cause over at https://ostif.org/donate

Supporting OSTIF means you are supporting free information, security and privacy worldwide!
